data.eml:eml: Additions to the xiphydriid woodwasp (Hymenoptera, Xiphydriidae) fauna of New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, David R., Villemant, Claire (2017): Additions to the xiphydriid woodwasp (Hymenoptera, Xiphydriidae) fauna of New Caledonia. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 61: 65-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.61.21787, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.61.21787
